languages.text: Прежде знаменитая страстной натурой, после знакомства с Лорд-капитаном Джай решительно отказала в покровительстве всем, кто его искал. Сердце ее принадлежало лишь Вольному Торговцу, и много удивительных приключений суждено было пережить им вместе. Спустя десятилетия на Кьяве Гамма был выстроен великолепный корабль, ставший флагманом династии фон Валанциус. Ему было дано гордое имя "Леди Джай".

Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.
languages.original_text: Прежде знаменитая страстной натурой, после знакомства с Лорд-капитаном Джай решительно отказала в покровительстве всем, кто его искал. Сердце ее принадлежало лишь Вольному Торговцу, и много удивительных приключений суждено было пережить им вместе. Спустя десятилетия на Кьяве Гамма был выстроен великолепный корабль, ставший флагманом династии фон Валанциус. Ему было дано гордое имя "Леди Джай".

traits.locale_text: Jae, who before was known for her passionate character, after meeting the Lord Captain, firmly denied her patronage to anyone who would seek it. Her heart belonged to Rogue Trader... and someone else. At the top of the Dargonus spire, an isolated villa was built, and the entrance was open only to the most trusted servants. Resided in this abode two twins, brother and sister. Their ski was dark, and black hair waved under the comb, and in their eyes, a sharp intellect shone. Anyone who saw the children admitted that they had a brilliant future ahead of them. Though could one expect any less from the bearers of the legendary name of von Valancius?

Jae, who before was known for her passionate character, after meeting the Lord Captain, firmly denied her patronage to anyone who would seek it. Her heart belonged to Rogue Trader... and someone else. At the top of the Dargonus spire, an isolated villa was built, and the entrance was open only to the most trusted servants. Resided in this abode two twins, brother and sister. Their ski was dark, and black hair waved under the comb, and in their eyes, a sharp intellect shone. Anyone who saw the children admitted that they had a brilliant future ahead of them. Though could one expect any less from the bearers of the legendary name of von Valancius?

Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly denied her favour to any who would seek it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma that became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel took the name Lady Jae.

Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly denied her favour to any who would seek it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma that became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel took the name Lady Jae.

Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

languages.text: 婕伊曾经以她热情的本性而闻名，但遇到领主舰长之后，她断然拒绝了其他所有追求者。她与行商浪人一同经历了各种各样的险境，而她的心也只属于行商浪人。数十年后，一艘辉煌的舰船在基亚瓦伽马星建造完毕，成为冯·瓦兰修斯家族的新旗舰，而这艘高傲的舰船被命名为“婕伊夫人”号。
languages.original_text: Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊曾经以她热情的本性而闻名，但遇到领主舰长之后，她断然拒绝了其他所有追求者。她与行商浪人一同经历了各种各样的险境，而她的心也只属于行商浪人。数十年后，一艘辉煌的舰船在基亚瓦伽马星建造完毕，成为冯·瓦兰修斯家族的新旗舰，而这艘高傲的舰船被命名为“婕伊夫人”号。

languages.text: Früher war Jae für ihr leidenschaftliches Wesen bekannt gewesen, doch nachdem sie dem Lord Captain begegnet war, verwehrte Jae standhaft jedem die Gunst, der darum buhlte. Nach den vielen Mühen, die sie gemeinsam durchgestanden hatten, gehörte ihr Herz {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Jahrzehnte später wurde auf Kiava Gamma ein glorreiches Schiff gebaut, das zum neuen Flaggschiff des Hauses Valancius wurde. Das stolze Schiff trug den Namen Lady Jae.
languages.original_text: Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

traits.locale_text: Früher war Jae für ihr leidenschaftliches Wesen bekannt gewesen, doch nachdem sie dem Lord Captain begegnet war, verwehrte Jae standhaft jedem die Gunst, der darum buhlte. Nach den vielen Mühen, die sie gemeinsam durchgestanden hatten, gehörte ihr Herz {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Jahrzehnte später wurde auf Kiava Gamma ein glorreiches Schiff gebaut, das zum neuen Flaggschiff des Hauses Valancius wurde. Das stolze Schiff trug den Namen Lady Jae.

languages.text: Autrefois célèbre pour ses passions débordantes, Jae ne se consacra plus qu'{mf|au seul seigneur-capitaine|à la seule seigneure-capitaine}. Après toutes les épreuves qu'{mf|ils|elles} avaient bravées ensemble, son cœur appartenait {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Plusieurs décennies plus tard, un glorieux vaisseau fut construit sur Kiava Gamma et devint le nouveau vaisseau amiral de la maison von Valancius. Ce fier bâtiment fut baptisé « Dame Jae ».
languages.original_text: Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

traits.locale_text: Autrefois célèbre pour ses passions débordantes, Jae ne se consacra plus qu'{mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Après toutes les épreuves qu'{mf|ils|elles} avaient bravées ensemble, son cœur appartenait {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Plusieurs décennies plus tard, un glorieux vaisseau fut construit sur Kiava Gamma et devint le nouveau vaisseau amiral de la maison von Valancius. Ce fier bâtiment fut baptisé « Dame Jae ».

languages.text: Antaño conocida por su personalidad apasionada, después de conocer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Jae empezó a negar su favor a todo el que lo buscaba. Tras las muchas adversidades que habían superado junt{mf|o|a}s, su corazón pertenecía a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Décadas más tarde, se construyó en Kiava Gamma una nave gloriosa que sería la nueva nave insignia de la casa von Valancius, y recibió el nombre de lady Jae.
languages.original_text: Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

traits.locale_text: Antaño conocida por su personalidad apasionada, después de conocer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Jae empezó a negar su favor a todo el que lo buscaba. Tras las muchas adversidades que habían superado junt{mf|o|a}s, su corazón pertenecía a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Décadas más tarde, se construyó en Kiava Gamma una nave gloriosa que sería la nueva nave insignia de la casa von Valancius, y recibió el nombre Lady Jae.

languages.text: かつては情熱的な性格で知られていたが、ロード・キャプテンと出会ってからは自分に好意を求めてくる者に同じ気持ちを分け与えることを拒むようになった。二人で乗り越えてきた数々の逆境を経て、彼女の心は自由開拓者のものとなったのだ。数十年後、キアヴァ・ガンマでフォン・ヴァランシウス家の新たな旗艦となる栄光の船が建造された。その誇り高き船はレディ・ジェイと名付けられた。
languages.original_text: Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

traits.locale_text: かつては情熱的な性格で知られていたが、ロード・キャプテンと出会ってからは自分に好意を求めてくる者に同じ気持ちを分け与えることを拒むようになった。二人で乗り越えてきた数々の逆境を経て、彼女の心は自由開拓者のものとなったのだ。数十年後、キアヴァ・ガンマでフォン・ヴァランシウス家の新たな旗艦となる栄光の船が建造された。その誇り高き船はレディ・ジェイと名付けられた。

languages.text: Bir zamanlar tutkulu tabiatıyla tanınan Jae, Lord Kaptan'la tanışmasının ardından peşinden koşanlara yüz vermeyi kesin bir şekilde bıraktı. Aştıkları nice badire sonrasında kalbi artık Hür Tacir'e aitti. On yıllar sonra Kiava Gama'da görkemli bir gemi inşa edildi ve von Valancius Hanesi'nin sancak gemisi oldu. Şanlı gemiye Leydi Jae adı verildi.
languages.original_text: Once known for her passionate nature, after meeting the Lord Captain Jae firmly refused to share her favour with all others who sought it. After the many adversities they had braved together, her heart belonged to the Rogue Trader. Decades later, a glorious ship was built on Kiava Gamma, which became the new flagship of House von Valancius. The proud vessel was named the Lady Jae.

traits.locale_text: Bir zamanlar tutkulu tabiatıyla tanınan Jae, Lord Kaptan'la tanışmasının ardından peşinden koşanlara lütfunu bahşetmeyi kesin bir şekilde reddetti. Aştıkları nice badire sonrasında artık kalbi Hür Tacir'e aitti. On yıllar sonra Kiava Gama'da görkemli bir gemi inşa edildi ve von Valancius Hanesi'nin sancak gemisi oldu. Şanlı gemiye Leydi Jae adı verildi.
